List of Best Government Jobs For Women In India

Bank PO and Clerk
Railway Jobs fr women
SSC Jabs For Female Aspirants
UPSC Jobs
TET Jobs
Police Job For Female Aspirants
Jobs For 35 Years Old Female or Older Aspirants
Defence Jobs for Women in India
Insurance Exams



Bank PO and Clerk

Bank jobs are the most preferred ones among females. It offers a good salary, better leave benefits, fixed working hours, reputation, and more. Moreover, with recent transfer policies implemented by the government, it is easier for a woman to transfer closer to their families whenever they need it. Also, the sense of stability and security that comes with a bank job can be matched by nothing. With Government coming up with more all-women branches in PSU, the scope of employment and growth is also increasing.

Planning to appear in the upcoming IBPS PO and IBPS clerk exam 2022? Ace your exam preparation with mock tests from Oliveboard.

Some Top Bank PO and Clerk Exams: You can view detailed information on each exam by following the links below

IBPS POIBPS ClerkIBPS RRB POIBPS RRB CLERKSBI POSBI CLERKRBI GRADE BRBI ASSISTANT


Railway Jobs For Women

Indian Railways, managed by the central government has a lot of opportunities for women. A job in Indian railways not just come with good salary but amazing perks like residence, travel pass, economical healthcare access, retirement benefits, and more. Besides bank jobs, in railways too transfer is accommodated depending on the situation. Indian railways also grant up to 2 years of leave in continuation with maternity leave, if applied for. Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) brings in various positions in the railways that are a perfect fit for women.

Following are the railway exams: You can view detailed information on each exam by following the links below

Railways Group DRailways RRB JERailways RRB NTPCRailways RRB ALP


SSC Jabs For Female Aspirants

Staff Selection Commission (SSC) conducts a combined graduate level (CGL) exam every year in order to fill various positions under the central government across Income Tax, CBI, Custom, Excise, and more departments. The major perk about these jobs is the kind of stability at work they provide. SSC CHSL is considered to be the best job for women having a qualification of 10+2.

Want To Attempt A Free SSC CGL Mock Test? Register Here For Free



UPSC Jobs

Various positions under UPSC are available for women. Along with a good salary, these jobs carry along with other government job benefits. Also, various civil services jobs under UPSC like IAS, IFS, IPS are not just the most sought after but also the most well-paid and reputed ones.Preparing for the UPSC IAS exam? Oliveboard’s mock tests will come as handy and beneficial.

Preparing for the UPSC IAS exam? Oliveboard’s mock tests will come as handy and beneficial.



TET Jobs

A teaching job is always considered to be one of the best jobs for women. The central government conducts the TET exam every year to evaluate and employ candidates in government schools and colleges. Few states also conduct state level exam for the same. One of the major benefits of a teaching job is vacation time when one can spend time with their family. The vacation time comes as a boon for mothers.



Police Job For Female Aspirants

All job profile in Indian Police (both national and state) is open for female candidates. So all young girls and women in the country can apply for state level SI, ASI, Constable jobs. Although, the State of Policing in India Report 2019 says that women make up only 7.28 percent of India’s police force, this number is bound to increase in near future. Maharashtra, with 27,660 women police personnel boasts of the maximum number of female recruits for a state/UT. Most of the police job notification exempts women from paying any application fees.



Jobs For 35 Years Old Female or Older Aspirants

As age is a vital and deciding factor for a lot of main stream entry-level government jobs in India. There are a wide range of opportunities available for female aspirants above 35 years of age. These openings in latest state and central government jobs have an age limit of 35 to 40 years. Check all upcoming Sarkari Naukri for women after 35 years are in various sectors. Most of these govt jobs are high paying in comparison to other age groups. Some of the female jobs in government organisations are –

State-level Public Services have an Age Limit of 23 -35 YearsPatwari Recruitment has an Age Limit of 18 – 40 YearsTET Qualified Teachers in national and state funded schools has Age Limit of 18 – 45 Years CRPF Assistant Commandant (AC) Recruitment Age Limit of 18 – 35 Years


Defence Jobs for Women in India

AFCAT, Indian Army and Indian Navy hires unmarried female graduate candidates as officers. Female NCC cadets can also use their NCC certifications for special entry in Indian Armed Forces.



Insurance Exams

The insurance industry in India has seen major growth in the last decade. Some demographic factors like the growing insurance awareness, retirement planning, growing middle class and young insurable crowd will substantially increase the growth of the Insurance sector in India.

Some insurance exams are: Government Ruled/Owned Insurance Companies

New India Assurance Company Ltd [NIACL]National Insurance Company Ltd [NICL]United India InsuranceOriental Insurance Company LTD

You can view detailed information on each exam by following the links below
